attributes.action: not impose a total cut of £15 Million in Slough's grant
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government claims the population of Slough is falling radiply and will continue to do so for at least 10 years. Despite overwhelming evidence to the contrary, the Government continues to say the people of Slough need less money because there are fewer people living here.

This savage and indefensible Government Stealth Tax is eqivalent to an increase in Council Tax of 75%!  

Please sign to show your support for the people of Slough.
